'''14w30b''' is the thirty-ninth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on July 23, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140727061744/https://mojang.com/2014/07/minecraft-snapshot-14w30a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w30c|date=July 23, 2014|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref> fix some bugs and crashes in [[14w30a]].

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Creeper]]s, [[skeleton]]s, [[zombie]]s'''
* A charged creeper explosion no longer yields more than one mob head.

=== General ===
[[Options]]

* Video settings
** Changed the 3D anaglyph effect to look more accurate close up.

|;old
|229|The fullscreen/windowed mode toggle status is inconsistent when using hotkeys.
|36883|Game freezes sporadically (0-3 fps) for varying periods of time.
|49292|Can't place End portal block in the End using commands.
|;dev
|58869|Not powered Iron Door has status '<code>powered: true</code>'.
|59035|<code>Damage</code> tag not working in {{cmd|testfor}}.
|59262|Water flows the speed of lava.
|59668|{{cmd|setblock}} clocks aren't working.
|62202|Debug profiling crash: <code>Ticking Entity: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1</code>.
|62582|Chests, signs, and ender chests do not render in empty chunks.
|62583|Destroying the last block model in a chunk causes ghost blocks.
|62896|Keep dying just after respawning.
|;prev
|63025|Chunks don't reload until the mouse moves.

== Trivia ==
* 14w30b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
